LanguageData.Filth_GGCaltrops.label: GG Caltrops
LanguageData.GGCaltropsPod.label: Ghost Gear Caltrops Pod
LanguageData.GGCaltropsPod.description: These pods contain a number of small devices that will explode when something steps on them. The explosion varies based on the type of thing that stepped onto it.
LanguageData.Shell_GGCaltrops.label: GG Caltrops shell
LanguageData.Shell_GGCaltrops.description: A pressurized shell filled with Ghost Gear Caltrops. Can be fired from mortars or installed as a trap.
LanguageData.Bullet_Shell_GGCaltrops.label: GG Caltrops shell
LanguageData.TrapIED_GGCaltrops.label: Caltrops trap
LanguageData.TrapIED_GGCaltrops.description: A pair of GG Caltrops shells connected to a touch-activated trigger. Since it is hidden in the surrounding terrain, it cannot be placed adjacent to other traps. Animals can sense these when calm.
